summary:
The ISO generated a sensitive patient record report that revealed employee A had accessed employee B's record. The report was sent to the supervisor for review of appropriateness. The incident is currently being investigated by the Supervisor.  ncident Update
08/18/11:
The employee accessed the other employees full name, social security number, date of birth and allergies. It is not known why the employee did this, however, they would not normally have had access during the course of their duties. Employee B will be sent a letter offering credit protection services.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
